scripts.build: nest build module-brain && nest build module-discord && nest build module-network && nest build module-order && nest build module-plan && nest build module-async && nest build module-balance && nest build stub
scripts.start:all: concurrently "nest start module-brain" "nest start module-discord" "nest start module-network" "nest start module-order" "nest start module-plan" "nest start module-async" "nest start stub --watch" "nest start module-balance"
scripts.start:all:noDiscord: concurrently "nest start module-brain" "nest start module-network" "nest start module-order" "nest start module-plan" "nest start module-async" "nest start stub --watch" "nest start module-balance"
scripts.start:all:watch: concurrently "nest start module-brain --watch" "nest start module-discord --watch" "nest start module-network --watch" "nest start module-order --watch" "nest start module-plan --watch" "nest start module-async --watch" "nest start stub --watch"
scripts.start:all:watch:noDiscord: concurrently "nest start module-brain --watch" "nest start module-network --watch" "nest start module-order --watch" "nest start module-plan --watch" "nest start module-async --watch" "nest start stub --watch" "nest start module-balance --watch"
scripts.start:prod:all: concurrently "node dist/apps/module-brain/main" "node dist/apps/module-discord/main" "node dist/apps/module-network/main" "node dist/apps/module-order/main" "node dist/apps/module-plan/main" "node dist/apps/module-async/main" "node dist/apps/module-balance/main"
scripts.start:memory: concurrently     "node --max-old-space-size=128 dist/apps/module-brain/main"     "node --max-old-space-size=128 dist/apps/module-network/main"     "node --max-old-space-size=128 dist/apps/module-order/main"     "node --max-old-space-size=128 dist/apps/module-plan/main"     "node --max-old-space-size=128 dist/apps/module-async/main"     "node --max-old-space-size=128 dist/apps/module-balance/main"     "node --max-old-space-size=128 dist/apps/stub/main"
